---
title: Cinnamon Protein Balls
description: Cinnamon protein balls
categories: [Healthy, Snack, Protein]
cooktime: 35 minutes
date: 2024-01-14
---

## Ingredients

* 4 g quick oats
* 4 g oat flower
* 3 g protein powder (1 tsp)
* 2 tsp ground flax seed
* 3/4 chia seeds
* 1/4 tsp cinnamon
* 12 g almond butter
* 1 1/2 sugar free maple syrup

## Directions

1. In a large mixing bowl combine quick oats, oat flour, protein powder, groundflax, chia seeds and cinnamon. Fold in the almond butter and maple syrupuntil a thick dough forms. If it is too thick to work with, add water in 1/2 tsp increments.
2. Use a tablespoon to scoop out dough and roll into balls, approximately three 1-inch in diameter. Chill in the fridge for at least 20 minutes before serving. Enjoy!
